entry.title: Fooling around with JavaScript and OpenPGP
entry.content: Fooling around with JavaScript and OpenPGP, as the title says. I needed to create a page in which I can encrypt files with OpenPGP. Doing this with JavaScript turned out to be possible. These are the results of my experiment. continue reading...

entry.title: New version of Pwman3 released (v0.9)
entry.content: Yesterday night I released a new version of my CLI password manager Pwman3. This is a major mile stone, with huge amount of changes and improvements. Read more to find about what changed, and what I learned writing this version. continue reading...
